items.name: Hometown Walk
items.description: A historic route through the heart of America, offering scenic views and cultural landmarks.

items.name: Near University Walk
items.description: A leisurely walk through the forest near the university campus, perfect for students and visitors.

items.name: Mountain Trail Adventure
items.description: A challenging mountain trail that offers breathtaking views and a true test of endurance.

items.name: City Park Loop
items.description: A relaxing loop through the city park, ideal for families and casual walkers.

items.name: Riverside Trail
items.description: A scenic riverside trail that offers a peaceful escape from the city hustle.
